ItemFilter.name: TSM Merchant's Lootfilter v3.2 - Semi-Strict
ItemFilter.description: Merchant's Guild Profit Centered Filter , 19 builds included , 4 Slots for customization, Recommended for Starting Monolith (No Corruption) , Join discord for Lootfilter Abbreviations + Updates: https://discord.gg/thesanctummarket
